1.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
1.name: Cleanse

3.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
3.name: Exhaust

4.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
4.name: Flash

5.description: Temporarily shields 75-330 (depending on champion level) damage from your champion. After 2.5 seconds the shield expires and your champion is teleported to safety. Melee champions travel extra distance.
5.name: Backtrack

6.description: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.
6.name: Ghost

7.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
7.name: Heal

11.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.
11.name: Smite

12.description: After channeling for 4 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
12.name: Teleport

13.description: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.
13.name: Clarity

14.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
14.name: Ignite

21.description: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
21.name: Barrier

30.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
30.name: To the King!

31.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
31.name: Poro Toss

32.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
32.name: Mark

33.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!
33.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot

34.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!
34.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot

35.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.
35.name: Disabled Summoner Spells

36.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.
36.name: Disabled Summoner Spells

39.description: It's a snowball! It's a Poro! It's...uh...one of those.
39.name: Ultra (Rapidly Flung) Mark

50.description: Revive a fallen friend by remaining next to them for 2 seconds. Exiting the area early does not consume your cooldown.
50.name: Resuscitate

51.description: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.
51.name: Ghost

52.description: Dash through spacetime, becoming briefly untargetable and invulnerable as you rapidly move towards a location.
52.name: Warp
